data.title: Vitalik Buterin Charts ‘Targeted Growth’ as Ethereum Hits 60M Gas Limit Milestone
data.description: Ethereum just crossed a major milestone and Vitalik Buterin is already pointing to the next one. After months of steady pressure from the community, the network is now running with a 60 million block gas limit, a full 2× jump in just one year. This shows up clearly in validator signaling, where sup…
